next_actions.desc: Escalate request for the official codebook plus any survey weights/strata metadata; log outreach attempts.
Extend the data dictionary to required covariates and start deterministic recode scripts for H1-H4 derived variables.
Synthesize additional literature on childhood emotional abuse and adult anxiety to strengthen H4 context/PAP.

notes: Documented SRS rationale + design memo, added purity-culture and wealth sources, and built the initial H1-H4 data dictionary.
